thread.title: Police release name of boy, 15, killed in Syracuse shooting
thread.title_full: Police release name of boy, 15, killed in Syracuse shooting - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Police release name of boy, 15, killed in Syracuse shooting
text:
SYRACUSE, N.Y. (AP) - Police in Syracuse have released the name of the 15-year-old boy who was killed in a shooting that also left a 17-year-old with a gunshot wound in the leg.
Officials say Thursday that Zavion Escobar of Syracuse was fatally shot around 7:20 p.m. Wednesday while sitting on a porch at a home on Hope Avenue. Police said later Wednesday night that the other teen's injuries aren't life-threatening.
Police searched the 160-acre Oakwood Cemetery after the suspects fled into it when they ditched their vehicle. A helicopter and K-9 units were then brought in to search, but the suspects remain at large Thursday.
The cemetery is located near Syracuse University, which was placed in a two-hour lockdown late Wednesday night as a precaution.
